def.dt: :to be deficient or missing time is lacking for a full explanation
:to be short or have need of something he will not lack for advisers
:to stand in need of :suffer from the absence or deficiency of lack the necessities of life

entry.et: Middle English lak; akin to Middle Dutch lak lack, Old Norse lakr defective

def.dt: :the fact or state of being wanting or deficient a lack of evidence
:something that is lacking or is needed
